output.sentences: Dozens of people waited anxiously in a crowd for the event to begin.
The first car was displayed sowing a bright red color.
The second car was white, and was applauded as it begin slowly driving by spectators.
As the yellow car passed by, it reminded everyone of a taxi cab.
The aspect most people remember that night was just how handsome the driver of the white car was.
